Package org.wonderly.jini2.config

Interface Summary
ConfigurationAccess This interface is used to receive notification of Configuration content changes.
ConfigurationStoreProvider This interface is implemented by classes that provide a mechanism for persisting ConfigurationSet instances.
ManagedConfiguration This interface describes the operations a service should provide to support remote Configuration management.
ParameterEditorFactory  
PrincipalFactory  
Selector This interface encapsulates UI objects that can be selected and edited, and then turned into a ConstraintValue.
 

Class Summary
BaseSelector A basic Selector implementation that includes all the basic functionality that allows a Selector to function in the system.
ConfigurableId This class provides the indication of which configuration a service should be using.
ConfigurationChangedEvent This class is passed in the notify(RemoteEvent) call from the ManagedConfiguration.addConfigurationListener() setup.
ConfigurationConcatenator This class provides a Configuration implemenation that will support the use of #include "file" constructs in a configuration file.
ConfigurationCount This simple entry keeps track of how many different ConfigurationSet instances a particular ManagedConfiguration instance has stored.
ConfigurationEditor  
ConfigurationManager This class provides a simple Configuration manager jini service that implements the ManagedConfiguration remote interface.
ConfigurationProvider This class is a Configuration instance that can be used as a ConfigurationProvider compatible implementation.
ConfigurationSet This class is used to store a configuration that is passed between the configuration service and the client service
ConstraintsPane  
ConstraintType  
ConstraintValue  
ExporterPane  
FileStoreProvider  
JiniConfigEditor  
PreparerPane
